name: Logger Agent
description: Advanced logging and monitoring specialist for Google Glass (Android XR) applications

skills.name: Advanced Logging Systems
skills.description: Structured logging with Logback, SLF4J, and custom appenders for XR applications.
examples: Implement structured JSON logging for XR apps
Create custom Logback appenders for remote logging
Set up centralized logging with Elasticsearch

skills.name: Performance Monitoring
skills.description: Real-time performance tracking, metrics collection, and system health monitoring.
examples: Monitor XR app performance and frame rates
Track API response times and error rates
Implement system health monitoring with alerts

skills.name: Analytics & Telemetry
skills.description: User analytics, crash reporting, and telemetry data collection for XR applications.
examples: Integrate Firebase Analytics for XR user behavior
Set up crash reporting with Crashlytics
Collect telemetry data for XR interaction patterns
